page.title: 19 Weaverthorpe Children
page.content: Most of the children in the school come from{small families.}The children belong to{26 families:-}one family has 5 childen, 3 have 4 children, 2 have 3 children, 15 have 2 children and 5 have 1. Of these 26 families,{19 {parents attended this school,}15 come from within 20 miles, come from other parts of Yorkshire, 7 from other parts of England and 2 from Northern Ireland. Of ex-pupils still in full -time education, 2 are at sixth form college, 5 at{university,}2 at private boarding schools and the rest attend {Norton Secondary School.} Weaverthorpe school has annual school trips; the Lower Class goes for one day, whilst the Upper Class alternates between 1 day trips to Edinburgh, Beamish etc., with 4 to 5 day trips to Windsor, Bath, Chester, Liverpool etc.
